title: Dyson groom tool in action - Official Dyson video
description:
The Dyson groom tool removes loose hair directly from your dog's coat. Collected hair is then sucked hygienically into your Dyson vacuum. Dog grooming without the mess. Problem solved.

http://www.dyson.com/vacuums/groom.aspx
http://www.youtube.com/DysonU

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
The Dyson groom tool removes loose hair directly from your dog's coat. Collected hair is then sucked hygienically into your Dyson vacuum. Dog grooming without the mess. Problem solved.

http://www.dyson.com/vacuums/groom.aspx
http://www.youtube.com/DysonUS
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson
#ProblemSolved

transcripts: Dogs leave wherever they go. It collects all over the home. There are many tools designed to stop dog hair spreading but their effectiveness varies and afterwards you have to clean the tool then the floor. With the Dyson groom tool. You simply deploy the bristles then gently brush the current loose fur is removed while dead skin and allergens are captured by the vacuum and to clean up. You simply release the trigger.
